title: When do batches start in Unacademy for the JEE 2022? - Quora

response.answer_text: Unacademy has already started the new batch for IIT JEE preparation for JEE 2021 & 2022 . But, it is never too late to join as they started it last month only. So you can still join it and view the recorded session of covered syllabus.
Already started. Check out the Pinnacle batch on Unacademy.
